item.description: I ask that when you are reading, if you would like to write down some notes of what part of the book you would like to discuss, that would be great.  Then please bring those notes to our discussion.  We will finish around 2 pm.  If you would like to bring a beverage, that would be fine.  There is no cost for the book discussion.  If you are interested, I recommend that you watch the DVD Conversations with God to see the story of how these books came into being.  I know the Plainville Library has it.
item.how_to_find_us: Walk down the spiral staircase, take a right through the doors and we will be in one of the two rooms off of that hallway.
item.why: A book discussion will be held on the following four dates: March 5, March 26, April 16, & May 7. Each time we will discuss 4 chapters. I also have a guide book to use to get us going on the discussion but we do not have to stick closely to it.
item.name: BOOK DISCUSSION: CONVERSATIONS WITH GOD (BOOK 1) BY NEALE D. WALSCH
